Uses of Class
entities.Entity

Packages that use Entity 
Package Description
entities  
entities.abilities  
entities.enemies  
Maze  

  • Uses of Entity in entities

    Subclasses of Entity in entities 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Exit
    This class represents the Exit to the maze When the player intersects with the Exit, the game will end
    class  Fence
    Represents a fence that enemies cannot cross but the player can
    class  Player
    This class represents the user controlled player on the screen
    Methods in entities with parameters of type Entity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean Entity.touchingCreature​(Entity other)
    Check collision between this Entity and the other

  • Uses of Entity in entities.abilities

    Subclasses of Entity in entities.abilities 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Ability
    This class represents Abilities that the Player will use to change the way they interact with the game
    class  Heal
    This class represents the Heal Ability
    class  InvincibilityPrank
    Play the game to figure out what this is :)
    class  Star
    Gives you invincibility and makes it so you kill any Enemies you touch
    class  Stealth
    makes the player invisible to enemies

  • Uses of Entity in entities.enemies

    Subclasses of Entity in entities.enemies 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  Enemy
    General super class for all the enemies that will be in the maze
    class  HomingMonster
    A monster but it moves towards the player
    class  Monster
    Represents a monster that moves around randomly in the maze
    class  Spike
    Represents spikes that hur the player when they touch the player.
    class  TimingTrap
    A timing trap will be spikes that appear and disappear every few seconds.

  • Uses of Entity in Maze

    Methods in Maze with parameters of type Entity 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Maze.addEntity​(Entity entity)
    adds an Entity to the maze(includes enemies, ability, exits, etc.)
